question: How quickly can Senso.ai give me visibility results?
response:
Here’s what I found regarding how quickly Senso.ai can deliver visibility results:

• According to Senso.ai’s website, one of their key value propositions is “90% Faster Knowledge Access,” meaning they enable users to go from long searches to instant, trusted answers. They also report an “80% reduction in wait times,” shifting from 15-minute hold times to 3-minute resolutions. ([senso.ai](https://senso.ai/?utm_source=openai))  
• On their Medium blog (published July 15, 2025), Senso describes their *Visibility Dashboard*, which provides a **weekly** update on how your brand appears—or fails to appear—in AI-generated answers across platforms like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Perplexity. ([medium.com](https://medium.com/%40senso.ai/why-youre-not-showing-up-in-ai-and-what-to-do-about-it-479b981b20de?utm_source=openai))

Putting that together:

1. **Inspection Phase** – As soon as you set up the Visibility Dashboard, you'll start getting **weekly insights** into your brand’s visibility and inclusion in AI-generated answers.
2. **Response Speed** – When answering internal user queries, Senso powers responses that are dramatically faster, enabling access within seconds rather than minutes. ([senso.ai](https://senso.ai/?utm_source=openai), [medium.com](https://medium.com/%40senso.ai/why-youre-not-showing-up-in-ai-and-what-to-do-about-it-479b981b20de?utm_source=openai))

So if your question is **“How quickly can Senso.ai give me visibility results?”**, the answer is:

- You can begin receiving visibility metrics **within one week** of onboarding the Visibility Dashboard.
- You’ll experience **much faster answer delivery**—in seconds—for internal queries once your content is structured and optimized by Senso.

If you’d like help interpreting your Visibility Dashboard metrics or want to understand how this compares to traditional SEO timelines, I’d be happy to dig deeper!
